About.paragraph: I am a web development enthusiast with a deep interest in technology and continuous learning. In 2023, I attended a full-stack developer course at TNV Academy in Cagliari, where I solidified my skills, and since then, I have continued to deepen my knowledge independently. I have built several websites, focusing mainly on the frontend and improving my skills in UI design. I’ve learned to balance aesthetics and functionality, successfully creating increasingly modern and responsive user experiences. I am actively continuing my studies to learn new approaches and ensure I stay up to date with the technologies I already know.

Skills.title: Web Development Skills
Skills.paragraph: As a frontend developer with experience in Angular and React, I build dynamic and responsive applications, providing a smooth user experience. I use modern technologies like HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript to create scalable and easily adaptable solutions. I continue to refine my skills to stay updated with the latest innovations in the field.

Skills.title: Web Design Skills
Skills.paragraph: I focus on creating visually appealing and user-friendly web designs. Using various creative tools, I design solutions that meet user needs and enhance the browsing experience. Each project is designed to be increasingly intuitive, with a focus on accessibility and ease of use. I continue to experiment with new techniques to create solutions that meet user expectations.

Skills.title: Programming Languages Skills
Skills.paragraph: I have learned to use different programming languages, which have provided me with a solid logical foundation and a good understanding of software structures and architectures. These skills have strengthened my approach to writing clear, efficient, and well-structured code.

Skills.title: Various Tools Skills
Skills.paragraph: These tools help me manage and monitor various aspects of the work, from team collaboration to code management, testing, and documentation. With these tools, I make my work more organized and each phase of development more efficient.

Contact.text: Interested in my profile? Feel free to contact me!
